works.description: We’ve seen some really luxurious aircraft interiors over the years, which show that there are no limits to how much in-flight luxury you can experience with those classy décors and high-tech features. At the Aircraft Interiors Expo (April 5-7, 2011) at the Hamburg Messe in Germany, a futuristic seat concept called Not For Wimps (NFW) is being exhibited, which aims to make flying experience pleasurable for the hardcore gamers. The prototype seat has been designed by seat manufacturer Contour Aerospace in collaboration with Factorydesign.
